title: Pokemon
description: A web-based application that allows users to view information and statistics about different Pokemon characters. Users can search for specific Pokemon or browse through a list.

title: Simple Calculator
description: A basic calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Users can enter numbers and choose the desired operation using buttons.

title: Todo App
description: A task management application that allows users to create, manage, and track their to-do lists. Users can add new tasks, mark them as completed, and edit existing ones.

title: Quiz Site
description: A web-based quiz platform where users can answer questions on various topics. The platform can keep track of scores and provide feedback to users.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A classic game of Rock Paper Scissors implemented as a web application. Users can choose between rock, paper, and scissors, and the application determines the winner based on the game rules.

title: Survey Form
description: A web-based application that allows users to create and share custom surveys. Users can design surveys with various question types (multiple choice, text input, etc.) and collect responses from others.
